vip_48: The specific rules for point inheritance are as follows
vip_49:
All VIP Points you earned in May x Multiplier (determined by your VIP level)
+
6% of all VIP points you accumulated between June last year and May this year.
vip_50:
Your total equals all VIP points earned in May multiplied by your VIP benefit multiplier,combined with 6% of all VIP points accumulated from June last year to May this year.

For example: A VIP2 player earned 200 VIP Points in May and accumulated 500 VIP Points from last June to this May. The inheritance points would be calculated as follows:
200 [May VIP Points] x 1.2 [VIP Multiplier] = 240 VIP Points
+
500 [Yearly Accumulated Points] x 6% = 30 VIP Points
= 270 VIP Points


If your VIP level is below VIP 8, it will be permanently grandfathered. Annually, at 00:00 on June 1st, your VIP Points will be reset. If you are VIP 8, your level will also be reset to VIP 7.
vip_53: Your inheritance points equal 10% of all VIP points earned from June 1 last year to May 31 this year, as well as all VIP points earned in May this year multiplied by a corresponding coefficient.
vip_55: Your Mall Limited-Time Gold reward will be doubled based on your current VIP level.
vip_57: The VIP Points you earn from each purchase and level-up will be doubled based on your current VIP level.
vip_59: Your Prize Wheel rewards are increased based on your current VIP level.
vip_61: Your Lobby Timed Gold rewards are increased based on your current VIP level.
vip_63: You will receive a VIP Lucky Dice every Monday and when your VIP level increases. Its rewards are enhanced based on your current VIP level.
vip_65: You will receive a VIP Daily Reward every day. The rewards are enhanced based on your current VIP level.
vip_67: Your daily purchase limit for Mall special offers will be increased based on your current VIP level.
